Occupation History:
Lynn Andrea Kammermann is a 58 year old Industry Leader from Switzerland.
Lynn Andrea Kammermann's first role was as a Research Scientist at Pfizer AG (Swiss branch), where she worked diligently from 1990 to 1994 to establish a strong reputation.
She then transitioned to Pfizer AG (Swiss branch) as a Clinical Trials Manager, leveraging her expertise to drive results from 1994 to 1995.
At Novartis AG, she worked as a Regulatory Affairs Director from 1995 to 1998, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
She appointment as a CEO at Johnson & Johnson Switzerland in 2000 marked a significant milestone in her career, as she took on increasingly complex challenges and delivered exceptional results.
Currently, she serves as a Industry Leader at Pfizer AG (Swiss branch), continuing to make meaningful contributions to the industry since 2002.
